tgt_original: ālambanaṃ svacinna syāt ubhayaṃ tanna śobhanam || 4 ||
iti cet tvaṃ kutohyatna yatnavāt naṣṭalābhayoḥ || 6 ||
paripūrya ca yaṃ svārthaṃ parārtha sarvathā'khalam |
timiramāśrayo yāvattāvannā saṃvādaḥ kuto na ca || 18 ||
svātmato jāyate naiva kusumācca tilaṃ yathā || 20 ||  abādibhyo yathā bījaṃ yajjātaṃ yata eva ca |
dṛḍhavāsanayā cet syāt uktaḥ svapnaśca no kutaḥ |
tasya pakṣe na doṣo'sti yasyopādānanāmakāt  jñānādanyat kāraṇaṃ na pratibandho na tasya ca || 28 ||
jñeyaṃ svacittajātaṃ yat rūpaṃ vā nāsti tasya ca || 32 ||
ekaikā nāvabhāsante tathāgataparicchidi || 34 ||  nirdhāritā nāṇavaḥ syuḥ tulyāparakṣaṇotpādyathānityatvavibhramaḥ |  avicchinnasajātīyagrahe syānnīlavibhramaḥ || 35 ||
te sañcitā iti proktu radravyāṇāti te kutaḥ || 39 ||  ekaśabdābhidheyāste na teṣāmekatāsti tu |
aṇu digbhāgabhedāccaneti yat tadasaṅatam |  aṇau dikśabda ucyeta kenacit saviśeṣaṇe || 45 ||
ābhāsante neti vādo yaḥ sarvo na sa sidhyati || 37 ||
iti siddhaṃ vādino yat nā cātra hetuniścayaḥ || 38 ||
ato bhedasya nāstitvāt piṇḍo nāstīti yadvacaḥ |
ato nāstīti no yuktam uktaṃ bhrāntivaśādyadi |
ṣaṣṭhadhīmātratābo ghaḥ yathāṣṭaparamāṇuṣu || 60 ||  saṃkhyādi bhrāntirutpannā pratītistasya sā tathā |
aṇuśca tasmādastyeva acalādigadhīmataḥ |  tato'nyenāgṛhītaḥ te jānantīti kalpyate || 64 ||
tadā tattu tathā vaktuṃ yujyate nānyathā punaḥ || 67 ||
āgamebhyaśca siddhatvāt caittānāṃ bhrāntitā na cet |
kathaṃ sādhāraṇe bhāva ekenaiva ca darśanam || 72 ||
svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭhasya sandigdhāsiddhatā tataḥ || 74 ||  bāhyābhāvataḥ siddhau svaikabhāge vilokite |
sahopalambhaniyama ukto yatpuruṣadvaye |  jñānajñeyasvabhāvaśca niyamāt saha vedyate || 65 ||
yadi jñānasvarūpasya vinā vittiṃ na sambhavet || 78 ||
jñānavitteḥ svabhāvatvāt vedyate ceti kathyate |  viṣayābhāsivijñānajanakatvācca vedanam || 84 ||  saṃvedyaśabdasāmye'pi tadarthaḥ pṛthageva hi |
yadi rūpaṃ kalpitañca kiñcideva hi vedyate |
anāsaṅgena darśī ca vidvān saṃviśate yathā |
yathāparīkṣitaṃ bhrāntyā vyavastheyaṃ kṛteti cet |  bhrāntākāro'vaseyaśca kathaṃ syāt kalpito nacet || 103 ||
kiñciddarśī tathā jñānarūpādau viśate punaḥ || 93 ||  sarvajñasya tadanyeṣāṃ na bhedo jñānamatrataḥ |
tattu nityaṃ vidyate na viṣayābhāsato yataḥ || 108 ||  samasvavedanā'bhāvāt jñānākāraḥ samānakaḥ |
nānantaraṃ jñānaṃ bhāti viṣayeṇa tu sāmyataḥ || 110 ||
tena te hyekakāḥ santyanubhāvyā na ca atra tu || 106 ||
tadanantaramāste cet tadā tadviṣayaṃ hi tat || 111 ||  tadā tannārthasadṛśam asti satyaṃ na tulyakam |
grāhyabhāgo'tha iṣṭaścet na yukta tasya lakṣaṇam || 113 ||
kuto buddhi nirvikalpā sa cittasyābhāsa eva ca |
janakasya ca nāstitve kathaṃ nāma tadiṣyate |
tadapyayuktaṃ jñāne nānantaraṃ jñānaṃ bhāti ca |
yat utpadyate yādṛk jñānaṃ yat tadanantaram || 107 ||
grāhye viṣayatava niyamāt viṣayasthitiḥ || 120 ||  lokato'rthasaṃsiddheḥ asti lakṣaṇamanuktakam |
arthākārāttu naiveti matañcet tat punaḥ katham |
tadabhāve ca tannāsti arthān svapnopaghātavat || 128 ||  vinā kriyā sammatā'rya kriyāsattvādataḥ punaḥ |
jñānaśakti laukikī cet nārthaṃtvena tu niścitā || 121 ||
anyatra jāyate svapnāt saṃsparśe kāmata striyaḥ |
taṃ samāśritya sambhute kasmānna svapnaghātavat |  nakhadantaratravādīni rāgāt śukrasya sambhave || 135 ||
arthakriyā na śakyeta tataścittakṛtā na sā |
yadānyacitte satyeva jñānaṃ niviśate hi tat |  satyatha [vā] tadākāraṃ vijñānaṃ grāhakaṃ matam || 142 ||
lakṣaṇena yathoktena grāhakaṃ cittamasti tat |  atītacittaṃ |
buddherarthaḥ kṛta iti tat punarna ca śobhate |
anirdaiśryañcarūpantu vedyate yat punarvacaḥ || 147 ||  anyasya vedyaṃ yat tattu nirdeṣṭuṃ kimu śakyate |
nirālambaṃ sarvacittaṃ nāsti tat yadi kutracit |  na bahirvidyate grāhyaṃ sarvajñaśca kathaṃ punaḥ || 149 ||
yadi svatantrā na syuste hyatītānumitiḥ katham |  nātītañcedanumitaṃ tattu syādatilaukikam || 169 ||
anumānaṃ bhavenno cet śraddhā ca kathamudbhavet || 170 ||
deyaṃ na vidyate tasmāt buddhatvañca na sambhavet || 162 ||
yadi prabandhato jīvaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ kila dṛśyate |
tattasya hetostat kāryaṃ niyamo'pi na vidyate || 173 ||
anyonyapravaśādeva vijñaptiniyamena ca |  dānādānākārikā ca buddhirutpadyate yadi || 163 ||
yasmin rāgādayo jātāḥ akṣīkṛtya ca kalpitam |
nāsaṃvādo yatna bhāvī tena san bhāva eva saḥ |
nyāyānyāyavicāre me'dbhutā budhadhīrnahi |  kintvanyeritasatyānāṃ bahusaṃkṣipya deśanāt || 187 ||
prativandhe'prasiddhe ca kathamasmādidaṃ bhavet |  amiśravyavahāraśca kathaṃ hetau pravartate || 177 ||
